title: Desiring the Dancer
description: Carlie Coleman is not looking forward to her stepsister’s bachelorette party.It was supposed to be a simple affair with a small group of Valerie’s closest friends at their parents’ beach house. Instead, the guests have tripled, there’s a fancy caterer, and at some point there will be strippers.It’s going to be a disaster… until she meets the cute waiter.Aiden Carter is sweet and she’s smitten. They can’t stop staring at each other from across the room. Their mutual attraction is undeniable. Before the night is over, she discovers something else.The cute waiter is also the entertainment.
author: Lilly Avalon
